Due to content policies, which does not allow certain content, and because it is impossible for us to control all the content that is published, we have decided to remove the Desire's community features.
But we have good news: more categories have been added, and soon we will add a lot of dares

Minor bugs fixed
Minor bugs fixed

Thank you for your valuable feedback. Your insight has helped us update Desire with new and improved functionalities in the journal. We have also have fixed a bug that some of you were having (thank you for emailing us about it). This new version, allows you to:
- Write comments on your journal entries and also on the entries your partner writes.
- You can also delete journal entries.
- You can change the image of the journal entries.
Thank you for your support! We keep working on new features and content.

Thank you for your valuable feedback. Your insight has helped us update Desire with new and improved functionalities in the journal. We have also have fixed a bug that some of you were having (thank you for emailing us about it). This new version, allows you to:
- Write comments on your journal entries and also on the entries your partner writes.
- You can also delete journal entries.
- You can change the image of the journal entries.
Thank you for your support! We keep working on new features and content.

Thank you for your valuable feedback. We have update Desire with new and improved functionalities in the private journal: now you can write comments on your journal entries and also on the entries your partner writes.

Thank you for your valuable feedback. We have update Desire with new and improved functionalities in the private journal: now you can write comments on your journal entries and also on the entries your partner writes.
We have update Desire with some issues some of you were having. Thank you for letting us know. If you need anything or you experience any bug, you can always reach us at info@desire.games Thanks!
We have update Desire with some issues some of you were having. Thank you for letting us know. If you need anything or you experience any bug, you can always reach us at info@desire.games Thanks!
Minor bugs fixed
Minor bugs fixed

In this new version, we fixed some bugs you notified to us, like removing a line showing on the top menu in iPhone X or the issue when starting the app with the iPhone XS Max. We appreciate your patience on these two bugs and we are happy to tell you that these are both solved.
We also solved other bugs and made a few UX changes. Thank you for being part of Desire!

In this new version, we fixed some bugs you notified to us, like removing a line showing on the top menu in iPhone X or the issue when starting the app with the iPhone XS Max. We appreciate your patience on these two bugs and we are happy to tell you that these are both solved.
We also solved other bugs and made a few UX changes. Thank you for being part of Desire!
We have included a new way for you to get magic coins and unlock more categories and dares.
We have included a new way for you to get magic coins and unlock more categories and dares.

But we have good news: more categories have been added, and soon we will add a lot of dares
